{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3333273,"name":"Freddy Yu","username":"FreddyYu","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/f/f0a364/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-14T20:29:36.445Z","cooked":"

Our team has two Limelights that we want to connect to our robot.

Is it possible to connect both to one single main channel on the PDP/PDH?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-03-14T20:29:36.445Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":21,"reads":121,"readers_count":120,"score":129.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":458686,"topic_slug":"can-one-pdp-pdh-port-power-more-than-1-limelight","display_username":"Freddy Yu","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55354,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/can-one-pdp-pdh-port-power-more-than-1-limelight/458686/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3333283,"name":"Domtech","username":"Domtech","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/domtech/{size}/138487_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-14T20:38:58.609Z","cooked":"

Yes, R621 allows multiple CUSTOM CIRCUITS per breaker:

From the glossary:

image704×63 8.94 KB

Just make sure to follow all other rules about wire size, fusing, etc.

Also pay attention to:

image694×152 33.2 KB

I highly recommend the REV MPM for consolidating your CUSTOM CIRCUITS:

REV Robotics

Mini Power Module

REV Robotics designs, builds and manufactures robotics parts and components used by students for learning about science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM). Our parts are commonly used within the FIRST Robotics Competition and the FIRST Tech...

Price: USD 35

You can also use a multiport passive POE injector to power multiple limelights such as this one or this one.
